646 căn hộ, dulex, penthouse và sky villa siêu sang giữa khu đô thị Thủ Thiêm Quận 2

General description

MAIN

PROPERTY

DEVELOPER

TRANSPORT ACCESSIBILITY

Title

The Opera by Metropole

Address

Plot 1.17, Zone 1, Thu Thiem New Urban Area, District 2, HCMC

Building area

11,369.5 sqm

Phases

Phase 1 is out: The Galleria Residence
Phase 2 is out: The Crest Residence
Phase 3 coming soon: The Opera Residence

Number of floors

24

Number of underground floors

3

Construction status

Under construction. Foundation commenced Q2/2020

Handover

Est Q2 2023

Handover condition

Fully finished

Elevators

Each apartment building has 4 Passenger Lifts, 1 Service / Fire lift & 2 Private Lifts

Property type

Condo / villa / penthouse / townhouse

Unit Types

1,2,3 & 4 beds (simplex & Duplex)

Price range

Price From HKD5,800,000 (HKD5,000/sq.ft.)

Total Units

646 apartments + 3 retail + 29 offices

Unit Square

Unit size:
• 1-4BR: 54.68~181.26 sqm
• Duplex: 215.59 ~ 286.86 sqm
• Loft: 69.11 ~ 176.93 sqm
• Sky Villa: 80.01 ~ 335.59 sqm

Девелопер

SonKim Land

Инвестор

HongKong Land

Rental Yield

Rental Yield Est. Gross Rental Yild 6% p.a.1

Ownership right

Freehold for Vietnamese 50-years ownership for Foreigners

Architect

DP Architects

Interior design

Kaze

Landscape design

Land Sculptor Studio

Management company

Highgate

FROM THE OPERA RESIDENCES QUICKLY CONNECT TO:

Thu Thiem Tunnel

East West Avenue

Hi-tech Park District 9

Ton Duc Thang street axis

Thu Thiem Bridge 1, 2, 3, and 4 connect to Binh Thanh District, District 1, District 4, and District 7.

The 1.5km-long aerial pedestrian bridge connects Thu Thiem to the end of Ham Nghi Street - District 1

2-min drive to District 1 via Thu Thiem Bridge 2

The East borders on Vong Cung Boulevard

The West borders the riverside road, the Opera Symphony Hall

The South borders on lot 1-18, lot 1-15 and road N13

The North borders the hotel complex.

About

The Metropole Thu Thiem is a mixed-use complex targeted at luxury loving and sophisticated customers. Presenting a new wellness metropolitan lifestyle, it is the only project possessing impressive connections to all major landmarks of Saigon old and new within a fewsteps.

Angsana Residences Hồ Tràm là tổ hợp

Owning a prime location right thu Thiem bridge 2 - connect to Thu Thiem area and the center of district 1, project The Metropole thu Thiem with more scales 11000 ha become a point between the real estate projects in the region.

The Metropole promises to bring a living space, class and smart right in the heart of the city but still dreaming beside the Saigon river.

The interior of The Opera Residence apartment is equipped with smart systems with the most modern technology to bring the best living experience to residents of The Opera. With a dual door lock system via face and fingerprint recognition, your beloved home will be truly safe for you to live here.

A seamless green view from the garden, swimming pools overlooking the Saigon River and District 1 city panoramas – residents can embrace these pleasures and much more at The Opera Residence.

Created to fulfill the desires of every resident, The Opera Residence offers a diverse range of facilities. A perfect combination pools can draw the attention of any resident: lap pool, family pool, kid’s pool, hot spring and outdoor spa pool. Encouraging healthy lifestyle choices is effortless with high- tech fitness equipment and professional personal trainers.Additionally,a golf simulator zoneid providedforgentlemento master their golfing skills everyday without spending a half-day traveling to any suburban golf courses.

Family values are also highlighted at The Opera Residence. With the kid's wet play area and parent’s lounge nearby, moms and dads can enjoy time together, comforted, having fun, safely nearby. Families can enjoy parties in the private BBQ pavilions, private banquet areas complete with kitchen equipment,or share happy moments with friends at the Alfresco café. SonKim Land’s restaurants and their famous chefs will be delighted to cater special occasions.

About

Angsana Residences Hồ Tràm là tổ hợp nghỉ dưỡng được Madison Land Ltd. đầu tư xây dựng tại cụm du lịch Hồ Tràm - Bình Ch​âu và do Banyan Tree làm đơn vị quản lý, vận hành. Dự án trải dài 280m mặt tiền biển và nằm giáp đường bờ biển nên rất thuận lợi cho việc đi lại của du khách.

Trình bày

Quy mô, vị trí, chủ đầu tư, tiện ích nội khu, thời gian bàn giao và giá cả dự kiến của toàn bộ dự án dưới định dạng PDF.

Chính sách trả góp từ nhà đầu tư SonKim Land

Nhà đầu tư của The Opera Residences, Công ty đầu tư và phát triển SonKim cung cấp dịch vụ trả góp cho mọi cư dân sinh sống tại Hồ Chí Minh và các tỉnh thành khác

Kỳ hạn
6 tháng
Trả trước
50 %
Lố
0 %

Chính sách hỗ trợ ngân hàng tại

Với mục tiêu mang đến cơ hội sở hữu nhà ở dễ dàng tại Sài Gòn, The Opera Residences mang đến cho khách hàng cơ hội hỗ trợ vay 70% giá trị căn hộ với thời hạn trả góp lên đến 35 năm.

Contacts

The Opera Residences tọa lạc tại Quận 2 Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh. Đăng ký để đặt lịch tham quan qua website chính thức.
